div.p: The following Observations shows examples of physical exams finding and simple assessments:

ul.li: An exam finding of abdominal tenderness .Note that this example uses the pattern 3 described in the "Using Codes in Observation" Section.
Observation to capture whether the mother is trained to change her child's tracheostomy tube. Note that in this example, the child is the patient of record and the mother is the focus.
